abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column examines unexpectedly bad opening month for Atlanta Braves, who have worst record in major leagues at 6-19; notes significant roster changes and contends team has nowhere to go but up.
lead_paragraph: The Braves, who open a new ballpark next season and have traded most veterans of value, lost 18 games in April. They did not expect to contend. But they did not plan to struggle like this.

headline.main: For Rebuilding Braves, No Place to Go but Up
headline.print_headline: For Rebuilding Braves, No Place to Go but Up

snippet: The Braves, who open a new ballpark next season and have traded most veterans of value, lost 18 games in April. They did not expect to contend. But they did not plan to struggle like this.
